name: WestRock
membership:
ECMA: European Carton Manupacturers association
Europen
goal: WestRock is the result of a merger between RockTenn and MWV. It is a producer of packaging, specialty papers, consumer and office products and specialty chemicals. The company has 153 operating and office locations in 30 countries, and serves customers in over 100 countries.
interests: Climate Action, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Packaging and packaging waste Directive
Circular economy package
Renewable Energy Directive
Falsified Medicines Directive
